channel.title: admin on Nikola Stoyanov
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Nikola Stoyanov

item.description: Hello! My name is Nikola Stoyanov and I am a materials science PhD student at the University of Manchester. My current research activities include the numerical element modeling of the structural and thermal resistance of shell elements using cohesive fracture models during low and high temperature exporures. I am also trying to figure out a way to make predictions without excessive computations and access to expensive software - analytical solutions are very difficult, but maybe new emerging methods can hold an answer.
